cause.description:
Since Al Gore pulled global warming right out of his ass, he deserves to be the one to pay for it. My point is that if there's no more Gore, there's no more global warming. So, please, help a rightful cause, and we'll do our best to destroy Al Gore.
1. Global warming is a load of crap.
2. Al Gore should DIE!!
cause.mission: Kill Al Gore because he's the asshole who came up with global warming to make money.
cause.name: Global Warming was Made Up by Al Gore!
